ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Newbie here :) with questions..
ygData.msgSnippet: Roleplaying is a BI%^& as an SK. We are the most evil of them all.  Of course, this is the true path, the only path, the path of blood. In my realm, I m
ygData.messageBody:
Roleplaying is a BI%^& as an SK. 
 
We are the "most evil" of them all.  Of course, this is the true path, the only path, the path of blood.  
 
In my realm, I'm taken as a ahole because I usually don't help newbies who are not of my god and/or class.  Seeing as we are the supreme Class, we should be aloff and not caring.  And talk that way.  Convert or die. 
*
Watch a good race die, then ( /em urinates on corpse) when he/she returns for it.  If they whine, tell them they are not worthy of your help.
*
You can help them, but be true to our god in doing so.
 
Before you do a locate corpse, have them shout out praises to your god. 
 
While this is all fun, it sux when you need help.  So keep close to your brothers and sisters. 
 
 
Batleth
ShadowKnight Iksar
 
"This Knight never Falls"
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: keregan26@...
To: shadowknight@egroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, November 14, 2000 2:36 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Newbie here :) with questions..

I recently created a DE Sk..and have a question about role-playing
the character. Now she is looked on by most to be evil...yet..would
she not have a different view of herself?

Would she believe herself, her race, and God are not the evil ones? 
How can that really be roll-played..and remember this is a total
newbie to role-playing here.

I have other characters..but seem to find my little Sk the hardest to
figure out :(

Any suggestions? Or any relevant info or guids on the web I can look
up?

Thanks! :)

Saelena - Dark Elf Shadow Knight

(Who also plays a character by the name Keregan....to explain my e-
mail address)
